price: Lalle ne, haƙĩƙa, Manzo* daga cikinku yã je muku. Abin da kuka wahala da shi mai nauyi ne a kansa. Mai kwaɗayi ne sabõda ku. Ga muminai Mai tausayi ne, Mai jin ƙai.
arabic: لَقَدۡ جَآءَكُمۡ رَسُولٞ مِّنۡ أَنفُسِكُمۡ عَزِيزٌ عَلَيۡهِ مَا عَنِتُّمۡ حَرِيصٌ عَلَيۡكُم بِٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ رَءُوفٞ رَّحِيمٞ
footnotes: * Bayãnin rahamar Allah game da aiko Manzõ daga cikin mutãne, cewa wata falala ce a gare su. Kuma shi Manzon nan ɗan'uwansu ne wanda bã ya son su da wani abu sai alheri, idan sun gãne dã sun bĩ shi, kuma idan ba su gãne bã, to, Allah Yã tsare shi daga sharrinsu, kuma Yã isar masa.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: laqad jāakum rasūlun min anfusikum ʿazīzun ʿalayhi mā ʿanittum ḥarīṣun ʿalaykum bil-mu'minīna raūfun raḥīmun
